fields.title: Water Projet
fields.description:
Canada International (RCI) editors have corrected their reporting which falsely asserted that Tel Aviv is the capital of Israel. As we noted in our alert, RCI’s reporting deligitimized Jerusalem as the Israeli capital.

Radio-Canada’s report now features the following correction notice on its website, as well, the RCI Youtube video report has been revised and republished:

Note to our audience: The previous version of the text included in the video referred to the state of Israel as “Tel Aviv”. We changed it to “Israeli government” to avoid confusion as to the city’s status and to be more precise.”

Though Radio-Canada couldn’t bring itself to acknowledge that Jerusalem is the capital of Israel, at least these corrective measures were executed. We thank Radio-Canada for its cooperation.
